sections.title: PMID Settings
text: BASE_PMID_URL variable set the link that is used to add to each PubMedId the pubmed article associated with it.

sections.title: Paths Settings
text: DOCS_PATH variable set the path on which the json documentation files are stored. DATASET_LOCATION variable set the path on which the datasets used are located. GENE_TABLE_NAME variable set the name of the GeneTable file. DISEASE_TABLE_NAME variable set the name of the GeneTable file.

sections.title: Cache Settings
text: Settings for the Flask cache used for downloading the tables. CACHE_CONFIG dictionary set some options about the cache. The cache stores the data as 'Key: Value' pairs. This is the name of the Key which will contain the table (as list) computed when an operation on the datasets is called, to be later downloaded. TABLE_CACHE_NAME variable set the name of the table cache.
